title: AI & Machine Learning Workshop
description: Learn the fundamentals of AI and ML with hands-on projects and real-world applications. Perfect for beginners and intermediate developers.

title: Cloud Computing Bootcamp
description: Master cloud technologies including AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud. Get certified and boost your career prospects.

title: Hackathon 2024
description: 48-hour coding competition with exciting prizes. Build innovative solutions and network with industry professionals.

title: Web Development Masterclass
description: From HTML/CSS to React and Node.js. Build full-stack applications and deploy them to production.

title: Data Science & Analytics
description: Explore data visualization, statistical analysis, and machine learning algorithms for business intelligence.

title: Cybersecurity Workshop
description: Learn ethical hacking, network security, and digital forensics. Protect systems from cyber threats.
